## jx get eks

List EKS clusters.

### Synopsis

List EKS clusters

```
jx get eks [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  jx get eks
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for eks
  -o, --output string    The output format such as 'yaml'
      --profile string   AWS profile to use.
      --region string    AWS region to use. Default: us-west-2
```
